alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 9:22PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony affecting Wabash, Posey, White, Gibson and Gallatin Counties. .Recent heavy rain will result in a secondary rise along the Wabash River at New Harmony. River levels are forecast to crest in the minor flooding range early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet next Tuesday afternoon March 15. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.2 feet on 03/28/2020. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
